member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumUtilities.LoadXmlDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an XmlDocument from a string.
member.param: The Xml from which to load the XmlDocument

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumUtilities.GetTextFromRawXml(System.String)
member.summary: Reads raw Xml and grabs the <text> node's inner text.
member.param: The Xml to be parsed. It should follow the lipsum.dtd but really all it needs a text node as a child of the document element. (<root><text>your lipsum text</text></root>

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumUtilities.RandomInt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a random integer.
member.param: The minimum value.
The maximum value.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumUtilities.RandomElement(System.String[])
member.summary: Gets a random element from a string array.
member.param: The array from which to retrieve a random element.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumUtilities.RemoveEmptyElements(System.String[])
member.summary: Removes empty elements from an array.
member.param: The array from which to remove empty items.

member.name: T:NLipsum.Core.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Properties.Resources.ChildHarold
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<!-- This is a template file for custom lipsum texts --> <lipsum> <copyright>This text is under public domain</copyright> <title>Childe Harold's Pilgrimage - Canto the first (I.-X.)</title> <author>Lord Byron</author> <text> oh thou in hellas deemed of heavenly birth muse formed or fabled at the minstrels will since shamed full oft by later lyres on earth mine dares not call thee from thy sacred hill yet there ive wandered by thy [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Properties.Resources.Decameron
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<lipsum> <copyright>This text is under public domain</copyright> <title>Decameron - Novella Prima</title> <author>Giovanni Boccaccio</author> <text> convenevole cosa e carissime donne che ciascheduna cosa la quale l'uomo fa dallo ammirabile e santo nome di colui il quale di tutte fu facitore le dea principio per che dovendo io al vostro novellare sí come primo dare cominciamento intendo da una delle sue maravigliose cose incominciare accio [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Properties.Resources.Faust
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<lipsum> <copyright>This text is under public domain</copyright> <title>Faust: Der Tragödie erster Teil</title> <author>Johann Wolfgang von Goethe</author> <text> ihr naht euch wieder schwankende gestalten die früh sich einst dem trüben blick gezeigt versuch ich wohl euch diesmal festzuhalten fühl ich mein herz noch jenem wahn geneigt ihr drängt euch zu nun gut so mögt ihr walten wie ihr aus dunst und nebel um mich steigt mein [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Properties.Resources.InDerFremde
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<lipsum> <copyright>This text is under public domain</copyright> <title>In der Fremde</title> <author>Heinrich Heine</author> <text> es treibt dich fort von ort zu ort du weißt nicht mal warum im winde klingt ein sanftes wort schaust dich verwundert um
die liebe die dahinten blieb sie ruft dich sanft zurück o komm zurück ich hab dich lieb du bist mein einz'ges glück
doch weiter weiter sonder rast du darfst nicht still [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.summary:

<lipsum> <copyright>This text is under public domain</copyright> <title>Le Bateau Ivre</title> <author>Arthur Baudelaire</author> <text> comme je descendais des fleuves impassibles je ne me sentis plus guidé par les haleurs des peaux-rouges criards les avaient pris pour cibles les ayant cloués nus aux poteaux de couleurs
j'étais insoucieux de tous les équipages porteur de blés flamands ou de cotons anglais quand avec mes hal [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator
member.summary: Represents a utility that generates Lipsum from a source.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates a LipsumGenerator.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Instantiates a LipsumGenerator with the passed data.
member.param: The data to be used as LipsumText.
Whether the data is in an Xml format and should be parsed for the LipsumText.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateLipsum(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium length paragraphs separated by environment linebreaks.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateLipsumHtml(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium length paragraphs surrounded by html paragraph tags.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateLipsum(System.Int32,NLipsum.Core.Features,System.String)
member.summary: Generates 'count' features. The format string will be applied to the feature not the result.
member.param: How many features are desired.
The desired feature, such as Paragraph or Sentence.
The formatting to apply to each feature.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.Generate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium length paragraphs separated by environment linebreaks. Standard Lorem Ipsum text will be used.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateHtml(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium length paragraphs surrounded by Html paragraph tags. Standard Lorem Ipsum text will be used.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.Generate(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium length paragraphs separated by environment linebreaks.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.
The text from which to generate the Lipsum.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.Generate(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium length paragraphs.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.
The string with which to format the feature.
The text from which to generate the Lipsum.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.Generate(System.Int32,NLipsum.Core.Features,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates 'count' features.
member.param: The number of features desired.
The type of feature desired.
The string with which to format the feature.
The text from which to generate the Lipsum.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateCharacters(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a single string (in an array with only this as an element) by getting the first 'count' characters from LipsumText.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateParagraphs(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium-sized paragraphs of lipsum text.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateParagraphs(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Generates 'count' medium-sized paragraphs of lipsum text.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.
The string used to format the paragraphs. Will not perform formatting if null or empty.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateParagraphs(System.Int32,NLipsum.Core.Paragraph)
member.summary: Generates 'count' paragraphs of lipsum text.
member.param: The number of paragraphs desired.
Used to determine the minimum and maximum sentences per paragraphs, and format string if applicable.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateSentences(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates 'count' sentences of lipsum text, using a Medium length sentence. Will use Phase formatting.
member.param: The number of sentences desired.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateSentences(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Generates 'count' sentences of lipsum text, using a Medium length sentence.
member.param: The number of sentences desired.
The string used to format the sentences. Will not perform formatting if null or empty.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateSentences(System.Int32,NLipsum.Core.Sentence)
member.summary: Generates 'count' sentences of lipsum text. If options.FormatString is not null or empty that string used to format the sentences.
member.param: The number of sentences desired.
Used to determine the minimum and maximum words per sentence, and format string if applicable.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.GenerateWords(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates the amount of lipsum words.
member.param: The amount of words to generate.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.PrepareWords
member.summary: Retreives all of the words in the LipsumText as an array.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.LipsumText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text used to generate lipsum.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.LipsumGenerator.PreparedWords
member.summary: Gets the words prepared from the LipsumText.

member.name: T:NLipsum.Core.Sentence
member.summary: A sentence that can be formatted.

member.name: T:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature
member.summary: Represents a part or section of text, such as a paragraph or sentence.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature.Format(System.String)
member.summary: Formats this feature based on its FormatString.
member.param: The text with which to format the string.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature.GetMinimum
member.summary: Gets the minimum subfeature value.

member.name: M:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature.GetMaximum
member.summary: Gets the maximum subfeature value.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature.MinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum amount of sub features in this feature.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature.MaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of sub features in this feature.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature.FormatString
member.summary:
Gets or sets how this feature should be rendered. By default: "{0}." (ends with a period.) For an html tag you could use "
{0}
". You get the picture.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.TextFeature.Delimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter between the subparts.

member.summary: Instantiates a medium sized sentence with Phrase formatting.

member.summary: Instantiates a sentence with Phrase formatting.
member.param: The minimum amount of words to be included in this sentence.
The maximum amount of words to be included in this sentence.

member.summary: Instantiates a sentence based on the passed criteria.
member.param: The minimum amount of words to be included in this sentence.
The maximum amount of words to be included in this sentence.
The string used to format this sentence.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Sentence.MinimumWords
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum amount of words in this sentence.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Sentence.MaximumWords
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of words in this sentence.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Sentence.Short
member.summary: Gets a Short Sentence. (MinimumWords = 2, MaximumWords=8)

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Sentence.Medium
member.summary: Gets a Medium length Sentence. (MinimumWords = 3, MaximumWords=20)

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.Sentence.Long
member.summary: Gets a Long Sentence. (MinimumWords = 6, MaximumWords=40)

member.summary: Common formatting strings.

member.summary: A string with no formatting.

member.summary: Formatting strings for Paragraphs.

member.summary:
An Html paragraph. "

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

"

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.FormatStrings.Paragraph.LineBreaks
member.summary: A block of text ending with a new line and/or carriage return (based on Environment).

member.summary: Formatting strings for Sentences.

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.FormatStrings.Sentence.Phrase
member.summary: A typical sentence ending with a period/full stop. "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet."

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.FormatStrings.Sentence.Question
member.summary: A sentence ending with a question mark.. "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet?"

member.name: P:NLipsum.Core.FormatStrings.Sentence.Exclamation
member.summary: An sentence ending with an exclamation point/mark. "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet!"
